Posted By: Guest513736147 (8/17/2010 8:16:43 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Simply astounding, a ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol) counter or bounce that gives a 2/2 upon resolution.   
  
I do wish he was more like [Voidmage Husher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Voidmage Husher) in one of two ways though, by either being able to counter an activated ability, or by having some sort of re-usability outside of the [Erratic Portal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Erratic Portal)/[Crystal Shard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crystal Shard)/[Equilibrium](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Equilibrium)-esque cards. Reusable bounce might have made him too good though.   
  
Maybe if he had something along the likes of [Sakashima the Impostor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sakashima the Impostor)'s ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol): Return Venser to owners hand at the end of turn, it would have been alright without being too broken or re-abuseable.
posts.html:
Simply astounding, a counter or bounce that gives a 2/2 upon resolution.

I do wish he was more like Voidmage Husher in one of two ways though, by either being able to counter an activated ability, or by having some sort of re-usability outside of the Erratic Portal/Crystal Shard/Equilibrium-esque cards. Reusable bounce might have made him too good though.

Maybe if he had something along the likes of Sakashima the Impostor's : Return Venser to owners hand at the end of turn, it would have been alright without being too broken or re-abuseable.
